scripts.build:mac-notimestamp: pnpm build:ts && CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false CSC_DISABLE_TIMESTAMP=true APPLE_TEAM_ID=A93Q7MKECL electron-builder --mac --universal
scripts.dist: pnpm clean && pnpm build:ts && CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --mac --win --publish never -c.mac.identity=null -c.mac.notarize=false
scripts.dist:mac: pnpm clean && pnpm build:ts && CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --mac --publish never -c.mac.identity=null -c.mac.notarize=false
scripts.sign:win-x64: pnpm clean && pnpm build:ts && electron-builder --win --x64 --arm64=false --publish never
scripts.test:win-signing: pnpm clean && pnpm build:ts && electron-builder --win --x64 --publish never
scripts.notarize:mac:x64: pnpm clean && pnpm build:ts && NODE_ENV=production CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false APPLE_TEAM_ID=A93Q7MKECL electron-builder --mac --x64 --arm64=false
scripts.notarize:mac:arm64: pnpm build:ts && mv dist dist-x64 && NODE_ENV=production CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false APPLE_TEAM_ID=A93Q7MKECL electron-builder --mac --arm64 --x64=false
scripts.notarize:mac:universal: pnpm build:ts && mv dist dist-arm64 && NODE_ENV=production CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false APPLE_TEAM_ID=A93Q7MKECL electron-builder --mac --universal
scripts.notarize:mac:all: pnpm notarize:mac:x64 && pnpm notarize:mac:arm64 && pnpm notarize:mac:universal && mkdir -p dist-all && mv dist/* dist-all/ && mv dist-x64/* dist-all/ && mv dist-arm64/* dist-all/ && rm -rf dist && mv dist-all dist
scripts.release:mac:x64: pnpm clean && pnpm version patch && pnpm build:ts && NODE_ENV=production APPLE_TEAM_ID=A93Q7MKECL electron-builder --mac --x64 --arm64=false --publish always
scripts.release:mac:arm64: pnpm build:ts && NODE_ENV=production APPLE_TEAM_ID=A93Q7MKECL electron-builder --mac --arm64 --x64=false --publish always
scripts.release:mac:universal: pnpm build:ts && NODE_ENV=production APPLE_TEAM_ID=A93Q7MKECL electron-builder --mac --universal --publish always
scripts.release:mac: pnpm release:mac:x64 && pnpm release:mac:arm64 && pnpm release:mac:universal
scripts.release:win:x64: pnpm clean && pnpm version patch && pnpm build:ts && electron-builder --win --x64 --publish always
scripts.release:linux:x64: pnpm clean && pnpm version patch && pnpm build:ts && electron-builder --linux --x64 --publish always
scripts.release: pnpm release:mac && pnpm release:win && pnpm release:linux
